name: Re-Roll Success
description:
Lost souls enter the Re-Roll system. A promised method in order to attain a rebirth. You are one such soul, entrusting your soul and aspirations to luck.

Part of the Game Maker's Tool Kit 2022 Game Jam. The prompt was "Roll of the Dice" and the game was made in 48 hours.

Controls

Move - W, A, S, D

Aim - Mouse

Fire - Mouse Left Click

To quit game you have to alt-tab out

Team

Walker Roberts - Lead Programmer, Animator, Writer, Game Design

Cord Bates - Art, Music, Sound Effects, Animator, Lead Writer, Game Design

Eric Aldridge - Programmer, Lead Level Design, Writer, Game Design
